howtoinvestfordummies.model

Interface IInvestment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Investment, Stock

    public interface IInvestment
    Represents any form of Investment a user may initiate in course of this application. An investment may have current value, money invested so far as cost and date of purchase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getInvestmentCost()
      Returns cost of investment made by user.
      java.util.Date getPurchaseDate()
      This method returns the purchase date of investment.
      double getValue(java.util.Date date)
      Returns current value of the investment.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        double getValue(java.util.Date date)
        Returns current value of the investment. To determine the current value of investment, the implementor may use external web resource or local data.
        Parameters:
        date - for which investment value needs to be found.
        Returns:
        cost in double representing the current value of user holdings in this investment.

      • getInvestmentCost

        double getInvestmentCost()
        Returns cost of investment made by user.
        Returns:
        cost in double representing the amount invested by the user.

      • getPurchaseDate

        java.util.Date getPurchaseDate()

        This method returns the purchase date of investment. It helps in finding when this investment was made which includes the date as well as time.

        Returns:
        date in Date consisting of purchase date.
